children.value: Instantly Connect Users to Your dApp

uPort is a self-sovereign digital identity platform—anchored on the Ethereum blockchain. The uPort technology primarily consists of smart contracts, developer libraries, and a mobile app. uPort identities are fully owned and controlled by the creator—independent of centralized third-parties for creation, control or validation.
Using uPort Connect allows you to:
Keep your users logged into an app
Use QR code & push notification flow for desktop browsers
Use frictionless app linking for mobile browsers

The uport-connect library is a client-side library that allows you to interact with a user's uPort identity—through the mobile app. Over this communication channel, you can create requests for a user's data, share credentials, and generate transactions to be signed on the user's mobile app.
